title: Butt & Thigh Clarifying Wash Off Mask | Butt & Thigh Booty Mask | Lightweight Wash Off Type Butt Mask for Cellulite, Stretch Marks, Skin Detox, Ingrown Hairs | Skin Firming and Clearing Booty Mask Formula for Sensitive and All Skin Type | Formulated with Collagen, Rosemary Extract, Centella Asiatica, and Other Natural Ingredients | 100% Natural, Cruelty-free | 2.7 oz
features: COLLAGEN PACKED SOFT & GLOWY BOOTY - Our skin nourishing Butt & Thigh Clarifying Wash Off Mask Mask is power packed with collagen and other natural ingredients. Its innovative and natural formula is infused with collagen and centella asiatica extracts to give your booty super supple and clear booty complexion.

EASY APPLY, QUICK WASH OFF TYPE BOOTY MASK – Our Butt & Thigh Clarifying Wash Off Mask has super lightweight and creamy texture. After 20 minutes of application, your booty will feel supple, soft and hydrated.

NATURAL & INNOVATIVE INGREDIENTS – Free of synthetic color additives, fragrance and stabilizers, our booty mask is packed with natural and innovative formula that helps reduce fine lines and cellulite, replenish moisture levels and relieve dryness.
DETOXIFY AND PURIFY SKIN – Our Butt & Thigh Clarifying Wash Off Mask works to gently detoxify and purify skin by drawing out impurities, oil and environmental toxins.
DIRECTIONS - On clean & dry skin, apply a thin layer to your booty for 15-20 minutes. After masking, please wipe the booty mask with a damp towel or wash off in a shower.
